name: Cottage Cheese Bake
author: Mandie
summary: Yummy high-protein and low-fat recipe. You can use low-fat or fat-free cottage cheese.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste  (Optional)
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix cottage cheese, spinach, eggs, and Parmesan cheese together in a bowl; pour into an 8-inch square baking dish and smooth into an even layer
Bake in preheated oven until the cheese is bubbling along the edges, 20 to 30 minutes
Season with garlic powder, salt, and pepper
